Groups

Group a series of buttons together on a single line with the button group. Use class -group to create it.

Global variables

$form-fieldset-border: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.2) !global
$form-fieldset-padding-vertical: $base-line-height-comp !global
$form-fieldset-padding-horizontal: $base-line-height-comp !global

$form-legend-padding: 7px !global

Use modifier _responsive_ to make groups responsive.
It means when screen resolution become less then 992px, then all groups become justifyed.

Responsive

Just make screen resolution less than 992px.
